options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Scroll[/color] speed
options.tooltip:
Set the speed at which you move across the map.[color="255 0 0"]
RESTART NECESSARY
This value is kept even if you disable the boonGUI mod.[/color]

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Rotation[/color] speed: Horizontal
options.tooltip:
Set the speed at which you rotate left/right.[color="255 0 0"]
RESTART NECESSARY
This value is kept even if you disable the boonGUI mod.[/color]

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Rotation[/color] speed: Vertical
options.tooltip:
Set the speed at which you rotate up/down.[color="255 0 0"]
RESTART NECESSARY
This value is kept even if you disable the boonGUI mod.[/color]

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Zoom[/color] speed: Hotkey
options.tooltip:
Set the speed at which you zoom in/out with your hotkeys.[color="255 0 0"]
RESTART NECESSARY
This value is kept even if you disable the boonGUI mod.[/color]

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Zoom[/color] speed: Mouse wheel
options.tooltip:
Set the speed at which you zoom in/out with your mouse wheel.[color="255 0 0"]
RESTART NECESSARY
This value is kept even if you disable the boonGUI mod.[/color]

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Zoom[/color] out distance
options.tooltip:
Set how far you can zoom out.[color="255 0 0"]
RESTART NECESSARY
This value is kept even if you disable the boonGUI mod.[/color]

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Zoom[/color] in distance
options.tooltip:
Set how close you can zoom in.[color="255 0 0"]
RESTART NECESSARY
This value is kept even if you disable the boonGUI mod.[/color]

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Windowed mode[/color] screen width
options.tooltip:
Screen width in windowed mode.[color="255 0 0"]
RESTART NECESSARY
This value is kept even if you disable the boonGUI mod.[/color][color="220 185 70"]

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Windowed mode[/color] screen height
options.tooltip:
Screen height in windowed mode.[color="255 0 0"]
RESTART NECESSARY
This value is kept even if you disable the boonGUI mod.[/color][color="220 185 70"]

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Top Panel[/color] Display time duration of replays
options.tooltip: Decide if you want to see the time duration of the replay above the top panel.

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Top Panel[/color] Gatheres or Income/10s
options.tooltip:
Specify what to display next to the resource count.

[color="220 185 70"]Gatherers:[/color] Total number of units that are gathering and on their way to gather this resource.
[color="220 185 70"]Income/10s:[/color] Total number of resources income over 10 seconds.

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Top Panel[/color] row color intensity
options.tooltip: Choose the color intensity for the rows.

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Right Panel[/color] Boon/Pro GUI when Playing
options.tooltip: Select bewteen ProGUI and BoonGUI

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Right Panel[/color] Boon/Pro GUI when Spectating
options.tooltip: Select bewteen ProGUI and BoonGUI

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Match Briefing[/color] Teams Recap
options.tooltip: Display a team recap when game starts

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Match Briefing[/color] Hide GUI
options.tooltip: Hide the GUI unil team recap is closed

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Right Panel[/color] Play sound when new units are idles
options.tooltip: Check if you want a sound to play when there are new idles

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Right Panel[/color] Play sound when new units are idles buildings
options.tooltip: Check if you want a sound to play when there are new idles buildings

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Top Panel [/color] Hide Allies Stats[color="220 25 25"] Need Restart [/color]
options.tooltip: Will hide allies stats when on. You can also assign and use the hotkey: BoonGUI hide allies Stats

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Top Panel[/color] KDr animation
options.tooltip: Check if you want a animation for short-therm kdr in the top panel for all players.

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Minimap [/color] Stat bars near minimap [color="220 25 25"] Need Restart [/color]
options.tooltip: Check if you want a animation for short-therm kdr next to minimap for viewed player.

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Right Panel[/color] size idle workers row [color="220 25 25"] Restart [/color]
options.tooltip: Set the size of the Icon for idles

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Right Panel[/color] size idle buildings row [color="220 25 25"] Restart [/color]
options.tooltip: Set the size of the Icon for idles

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Right Panel[/color] Show EcoPanels [color="220 25 25"] Need Restart [/color]
options.tooltip: Show and enable ProGUI eco panels, small performance gain when disabled

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Trainer[/color] Hide TrainerPanel when turned off
options.tooltip: Check if you want to hide trainer tab when it's off

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Right Panel[/color] Theme Color [color="220 25 25"] Need Restart [/color]
options.tooltip: Change the color of the buttons when toggled.

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Right Panel[/color] Stacked sub-Menus [color="220 25 25"] Need Restart [/color]
options.tooltip: Check if you want all sub-menus to show on the right panel, can be confusing if you don't know what are they associated to

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Top Panel Settings[/color] Message requesting help
options.tooltip: Will send: this message + Resource clicked, in chat.

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Trainer[/color] Hide TrainerPanel when truned off
options.tooltip: Check if you want to hide trainer tab when it's off

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Trainer[/color] max units per batch
options.tooltip: Set the maximum number of units trainable in a single batch

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Trainer[/color] food reserve
options.tooltip: Unit training won't consume food below this reserve

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Trainer[/color] wood reserve
options.tooltip: Unit training won't consume wood below this reserve

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Trainer[/color] stone reserve
options.tooltip: Unit training won't consume stone below this reserve

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Trainer[/color] metal reserve
options.tooltip: Unit training won't consume metal below this reserve

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Trainer GamePlay Mode[/color][color="100 135 225"] Queue [/color]or [color="100 135 225"]Compo[/color]
options.tooltip: Compo mode changes to Trainer Panel: When activating or desactivating a unit for the trainer, don't forget the value. Will also start a game with preset 50% inf 50% ranged. Recommanded for advanced users.

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Trainer[/color] Train weaker units first (reverse priority order)
options.tooltip: Check if you want, for example, females to train over cavalry if both are toggled in the Training Tab

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Trainer[/color] Strict Composition [color="220 25 25"]May result in idle buildings[/color]
options.tooltip: 'Hard Limit' Will stop training any units if it's already over composition (Ex: Stables stay idles if cav is trained over target)

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Trainer[/color] allocation Increment (Scroll)
options.tooltip: 'scroll speed' Set the incrementation size when changing trainer allocation (with mouse wheel)

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]NextPhase[/color] Push Order front
options.tooltip: If the current production has a time remaining over this time, order will be pushed to front (in ms, 1000 = 1sec)

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Trainer[/color] Buildings
options.tooltip: Classes of buildings that are used by the trainer

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Trainer[/color] Enable Corral Production [color="220 25 25"] Need Restart [/color]
options.tooltip: Produce Animals from Corrals

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Trainer[/color] Corral MaxBatch
options.tooltip: Max units to train in corrals

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Auto-Tribute Settings[/color] resource reserve
options.tooltip: Won't share resource below the set reserve

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Auto-Tribute Settings[/color] share weight food
options.tooltip: 0 won't share food, 1 will treat ally food as important as yours

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Auto-Tribute Settings[/color] share weight wood
options.tooltip: 0 won't share wood, 1 will treat ally wood as important as yours

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Auto-Tribute Settings[/color] share weight stone
options.tooltip: 0 won't share stone, 1 will treat ally stone as important as yours

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Auto-Tribute Settings[/color] share weight metal
options.tooltip: 0 won't share metal, 1 will treat ally metal as important as yours

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Eco-Help Lumber[/color] Activate Lumber upgrade
options.tooltip: Check if you want lumber upgrades to be researched when available

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Eco-Help Lumber[/color] Wood amount Phase I
options.tooltip: Amount of wood in reserve before researching upgrade in Phase I

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Eco-Help Farm[/color] Activate Farm upgrade
options.tooltip: Check if you want farm upgrades to be researched when available

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Eco-Help Farm[/color] Wood amount Phase I
options.tooltip: Amount of wood in reserve before researching upgrade in Phase I

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Eco-Help Gather[/color] Activate Fruits Gathering upgrade
options.tooltip: Check if you want Fruits Gathering upgrades to be researched when available

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Barter[/color] Enable Market Pice Panel [color="220 25 25"] Need Restart [/color]
options.tooltip: Check if you want the market prices options to show on the right panel

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Right Panel[/color] Same configuration as last game
options.tooltip: On: will activate helpers that you last used in previous game, OFF: will always start with all off.

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]QuickStart[/color] EnableQuickStart
options.tooltip: Decide if you want QuickStart enabled or not

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]QuickStart[/color] Melee units assignement
options.tooltip: What should melee infantry gather?

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]QuickStart[/color] Ranged units assignement
options.tooltip: What should ranged infantry gather?

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]QuickStart[/color] Cavalry units assignement
options.tooltip: What should cavalry gather?

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]QuickStart[/color] Females assignement
options.tooltip: What should females gather? Set to meat to play like DoctorOrgans.

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]QuickStart[/color] Select units
options.tooltip: What units do you want selected?

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]QuickStart[/color] First training batch unit type
options.tooltip: What units do you want selected?

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]QuickStart[/color] First training batch size
options.tooltip: Amount of units to train the first batch when starting (will be rounded)

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]QuickStart[/color] Camera focus
options.tooltip: What resource to focus camera on?

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]QuickStart[/color] Prepare Building
options.tooltip: What building to prepare?

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]QuickStart[/color] Set Rally Point
options.tooltip: What resource to set rally on?

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]QuickStart[/color] Unload unassigned units
options.tooltip: Keep unassigned units Garnisoned if unchecked

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Seeh Chain[/color] Enable
options.tooltip: Impact performance. Not recommanded.

options.label: [color="220 185 70"]Seeh Chain[/color] Logs
options.tooltip: Display logs and helpers for Seeh Chain
